My name is Nastia Tulayeva. I'm a designer and design engineering dummy.

Raised in Belarus, based in Belgrade, Serbia. I have experience of being an architect, urbanist, event manager, editor and Tableau dashboard engineer.

I know:

UX/UI and product design Branding and logos B2B SaaS and B2C HTML and CSS AI-first Accessibility Digital illustration User and market research UX copy Product management Data visualisation Dashboard design

I design with Figma or with code. Illustrations are drawn by hand, in ProCreate, or Illustrator. I'm familiar with Jira and Confluence, and can work with Microsoft Azure DevOps. I worked mostly in cross-functional teams, and as a part of design teams of 10+ people too. Here is my CV.
